tool.name: SAGA.pointcloud_tools.9
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.pointcloud_tools.9 INPUT $INPUT PERCENT $PERCENT NUMBER $NUMBER prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-lasf

param.name: PERCENT
param.label: Percent
param.help: Reduce the number of points to this percentage.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: This simple thinning tool reduces the number of points in a point cloud by sequential point removal. It is therefore most suited for points stored in chronological order.
